message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $95. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I was thinking more along the lines of $85. It's a bit lower than your original offer, but I'm really interested in the product and I'm willing to meet you halfway.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm valuing the product at a minimum of $90. How about we split the difference and settle at $87.50?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $82.50, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?
